comment.realname: lifeasdaddy ...a guy, his wife, and their son...
comment.author: 13267298@N00
comment._content: Whilst I am a fan of John Wayne's film acting, to describe him as being "dressed in full military uniform" has some slight controversy and slight inaccuracy attached to it, due to his actual lack of service in the military during World War II. Wikipedia has a pretty evenhanded (at the moment) coverage of this controversy here: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Wayne#Military_service_controv...

comment.author: 34713354@N07
comment._content: Looks like an eagle on the Colonel's shoulder. He's a full colonel, not a lt. col.
